function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited resources of the government may impact the effectiveness of support for consumer loans in housing and automotive industry.","Impact":"Potential increase in housing prices and delayed impact on the housing market.","Mitigation":"Allocate additional resources or seek alternative financing solutions to ensure the effectiveness of the support.","Technologies":"Financial risk management tools, economic forecasting models.","People":"Consumers, homeowners, individuals in the automotive industry.","Owner":"Government, financial institutions, housing authorities."},{"Description":"Backlog in car production due to surge in demand after support for consumer loans.","Impact":"Disruption in the supply chain and potential bottlenecks in the automotive industry.","Mitigation":"Implement agile production strategies and collaborate with suppliers to manage the backlog effectively.","Technologies":"Supply chain management systems, production planning software.","People":"Automotive industry workers, suppliers, consumers.","Owner":"Car manufacturers, supply chain managers."},{"Description":"Increased cooperation between government and financial sector may lead to efficient management of economic crises.","Impact":"Stabilization of the economy and reduction in the severity of financial crises.","Mitigation":"Continued collaboration and communication between government and financial institutions to address potential future crises.","Technologies":"Financial risk assessment tools, crisis management platforms.","People":"Government officials, financial sector professionals, economists.","Owner":"Government, financial institutions, economic authorities."}]}
